parameter.name: prettyOutput
parameter.description: If the prettyOutput is specified as 1, will return an indented response of the output.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The array of fileds to be returned in the output.

parameter.name: customFields
parameter.description: JSON Object specifying the values for the Organization's custom fields created in the account, keys for the object are the 40-character hashes assigned for the respective custom fields

parameter.name: ownerId
parameter.description: The ID of the user who will be marked as the owner of this organization.

parameter.name: visibility
parameter.description: Visibility of the organization. If omitted, visibility will be set to the default visibility, possible values are 0,1,2

parameter.name: addedTime
parameter.description: Optional creation date and time of the organization in UTC. Requires admin user API token. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
